mapper.select: select t.id as ticket_id, t.pickup_date, c.name as provide_ticket_company_name, t.quantity, t.start_number, t.end_number, t.delivery_date, b.id as bill_id, b.company_id as use_ticket_company_id, bc.name as use_ticket_company_name, b.books, b.used_quantity, b.ton, b.unit_price, b.total_price, b.state, b.payment_amount, b.payment_date, b.payment_method, b.balance from ticket t left join company c on t.company_id = c.id left join bill b on t.id = b.ticket_id left join company bc on b.company_id = bc.id
